entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 9:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -39.5°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -43.5°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
